script.name: !move.mine.auto
script.sourceplaintext:
* =============================================== * Automated Mining Script * =============================================== * Author: Cycrow * Date: 2018/12/22 * ===============================================
* check for correct equipment
$Page.ID = 6020 $blacklist.sectors = table alloc
$ADVANCED.MINING = [FALSE] do if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Mining Command Software in cargo bay $ADVANCED.MINING = [TRUE] $IS.PLAYER = [OWNER] == Player
do if $ADVANCED.MINING AND $IS.PLAYER @ = [THIS] -> call script lib.ship.var.setpilotname : ship=[THIS] experience=null rank=null ranktype=null
@ if not [THIS] -> call script !lib.player.checkvalidroute : Destination Sector=$a.sector Allow Target=[FALSE] Command Rejected Sound=[TRUE] return FLRET_NOPATH end
* move to start sector first if [SECTOR] != $a.sector $dest.sector = $a.sector gosub sub.MoveToSector end
$standby = [FALSE] $retry.times = 0 $last.time = playing time $last.time = $last.time - 10 * main loop while [TRUE] @ = wait 100 ms
$current.time = playing time if $current.time <= ( $last.time + 5 ) if $retry.times > 3 AND [SECTOR] != $a.sector $dest.sector = $a.sector $standby = [TRUE] gosub sub.MoveToSector continue end if $standby if not [DOCKEDAT] if [HOMEBASE] -> exists $destination = [HOMEBASE] gosub sub.MoveToStation continue end if $a.dropoff $i = size of array $a.dropoff while $i dec $i = $destination = $a.dropoff[$i] if $destination -> is docking possible of [THIS] if [THIS] -> is docking allowed at $destination gosub sub.MoveToStation continue end end end end end $text = read text: page=2010 id=6 [THIS] ->set command extra display override: text=$text @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.idle.timeout : timeout in sec=20 wait while docked=[TRUE] continue else $text = read text: page=$Page.ID id=2100 [THIS] ->set command extra display override: text=$text @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.idle.timeout : timeout in sec=20 wait while docked=[TRUE] inc $retry.times = continue end end
$retry.times = 0 $last.time = $current.time
gosub sub.CheckBlacklist @ = wait randomly from 500 to 1000 ms
gosub sub.CanMineAsteroids $CAN.MINE.ASTRO = $ret.Value gosub sub.CanMineRocks $CAN.MINE.ROCKS = $ret.Value
@ = wait 100 ms
$has.space = [FALSE] $size = size of array $a.minerals while $size dec $size = $mineral = $a.minerals[$size] if [THIS] -> get free amount of ware $mineral in cargo bay $has.space = [TRUE] break end end
if $has.space gosub sub.FindSector $dest.sector = $ret.Value if $dest.sector -> exists if [DOCKEDAT] $docked.owner = [DOCKEDAT] -> get owner race if $docked.owner == [OWNER] if find [DOCKEDAT] in array: $a.dropoff $i = size of array $a.minerals while $i dec $i = $mineral = $a.minerals[$i] $amt = [THIS] -> get free amount of ware $mineral in cargo bay if $amt do if [DOCKEDAT] -> get free amount of ware $mineral in cargo bay = [THIS] -> unload $amt units of $mineral end end end end end
$standby = [FALSE] gosub sub.MoveToSector if [SECTOR] == $dest.sector @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.mine.sector : Mineral Array=$a.minerals Amount=-1 Break Asterods?=$ADVANCED.MINING end continue end end
if $a.dropoff AND ! $a.sell if size of array $a.dropoff gosub sub.GetDropoffStorage if not $ret.Value $standby = [TRUE] continue end end end
* not enough space, sell or drop off $aMinerals = clone array: $a.minerals while size of array $aMinerals $size = size of array $aMinerals $rnd = random value from 0 to $size - 1 $mineral = $aMinerals[$rnd] remove element from array $aMinerals at index $rnd do if [THIS] -> get amount of ware $mineral in cargo bay gosub sub.Dropoff do if [THIS] -> get amount of ware $mineral in cargo bay gosub sub.Sell end end
* =============================================== return null * =============================================== * ===============================================
* =============================================== sub.Sell: if $a.sell $price = get average price of ware $mineral $destination = find station: resource $mineral with best price: min.price=$price, amount=1, max.jumps=$a.moverange, startsector=[SECTOR], trader=[THIS], exclude array=$blacklist.sectors if $destination -> exists if [TRUEOWNER] == Player @ if not [THIS] -> call script !lib.player.saferoute : Destination=$destination Ignore Jump=[FALSE] Always Jump=[FALSE] Additional Blacklist=null Ignore Fuel=[FALSE] Allow Table=null $check.sector = $destination -> get sector $blacklist.sectors[$check.sector] = $check.sector @ = wait 100 ms endsub end end $standby = [FALSE] gosub sub.MoveToStation endsub end end endsub
* =============================================== sub.MoveToStation: $text = sprintf: pageid=$Page.ID textid=2077, $destination, null, null, null, null [THIS] ->set command extra display override: text=$text [THIS] ->set destination to $destination
$dest.sector = $destination -> get sector
@ $ret = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetosector : sector=$dest.sector if $ret == FLRET_NOPATH $time = playing time $time = $time + 3600 $blacklist.sectors[$dest.sector] = $time else if [SECTOR] == $dest.sector if [THIS] -> is docking allowed at $destination if $destination -> is docking possible of [THIS] @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetostation : station=$destination end end
if [DOCKEDAT] == $destination @ = wait randomly from 2000 to 5000 ms skip if [THIS] -> is in active sector @ = wait 5000 ms
$docked.owner = [DOCKEDAT] -> get owner race
$i = size of array $a.minerals while $i dec $i = $m = $a.minerals[$i] $amt = [THIS] -> get amount of ware $m in cargo bay if $amt if [OWNER] == $docked.owner = [THIS] -> unload $amt units of $m else if $destination -> can buy ware $m = [THIS] -> sell $amt units of $m end end end else if $destination -> is of class Ship @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetoobject : Target=$destination Range=4000 else @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetoobject : Target=$destination Range=10000 end $docked.owner = $destination -> get owner race $deliver.wares = table alloc $i = size of array $a.minerals while $i dec $i = $m = $a.minerals[$i] $amt = [THIS] -> get amount of ware $m in cargo bay $free = $destination -> get free amount of ware $m in cargo bay $amt = get minimum, $amt, $free, null, null, null if $amt > 0 $deliver.wares[$m] = $amt end end
$resupply.wares = [THIS] ->get resupply table $next.key = get next key: table=$resupply.wares key=null while $next.key $ware = $next.key $next.key = get next key: table=$resupply.wares key=$next.key $amt = $resupply.wares[$ware] $free = [THIS] -> get amount of ware $amt in cargo bay $amt = $amt - $free if $amt > 0 $resupply.wares[$ware] = $amt else remove key $ware from table $resupply.wares end end
if size of table $deliver.wares $use.drone = [TRUE] if [OWNER] == $docked.owner if $destination -> is of class Ship $this.transport = [THIS] -> get amount of ware Transporter Device in cargo bay $dest.transport = $destination -> get amount of ware Transporter Device in cargo bay if $dest.transport OR $this.transport @ = wait randomly from 5000 to 10000 ms $use.drone = [FALSE] $m = get next key: table=$deliver.wares key=null while $m $amt = $deliver.wares[$m] $amt = - $amt $amt = [THIS] -> add $amt units of $m $amt = - $amt $amt = $destination -> add $amt units of $m $m = get next key: table=$deliver.wares key=$m end $ware = get next key: table=$resupply.wares key=null while $ware $amt = $resupply.wares[$ware] $amt = $destination -> add $amt units of $ware $amt = - $amt $amt = [THIS] -> add $amt units of $ware $ware = get next key: table=$resupply.wares key=$ware end end end end
if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Freight Drone in cargo bay if $use.drone if [OWNER] == $docked.owner $text = read text: page=$Page.ID id=2080 else $text = read text: page=$Page.ID id=2102 end [THIS] ->set command extra display override: text=$text @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.freighttransfer : Target Ship=$destination Wares to send=$deliver.wares Wares to receive=$resupply.wares end end end
end end [THIS] ->set destination to null @ = wait randomly from 2000 to 5000 ms skip if [THIS] -> is in active sector @ = wait 5000 ms endsub
* =============================================== sub.Dropoff: if $a.dropoff @ = wait 1000 ms
$table = table alloc $i = size of array $a.dropoff while $i dec $i = $destination = $a.dropoff[$i] if not $destination -> is docking possible of [THIS] if not [THIS] -> get amount of ware Freight Drone in cargo bay if $destination -> is of class Ship if not [THIS] -> get amount of ware Transporter Device in cargo bay skip if $destination -> get amount of ware Transporter Device in cargo bay continue end else continue end end end
if $destination -> get free amount of ware $mineral in cargo bay $dest.sector = $destination -> get sector $jumps = get jumps from sector [SECTOR] to sector $dest.sector $table[$destination] = $jumps end end
if size of table $table $sorted.array = sort table keys by value: table=$table
$size = size of array $sorted.array $i = 0 while $i < $size $destination = $sorted.array[$i] gosub sub.MoveToStation $standby = [FALSE] skip if [THIS] -> get amount of ware $mineral in cargo bay break inc $i = end end
end endsub
* =============================================== sub.FindSector: $ret.Value = null $array = [THIS] -> find all sectors within $a.moverange jumps: Only known sectors=$IS.PLAYER $table.sectors = table alloc $i = size of array $array while $i dec $i = $sector = $array[$i] do if $blacklist.sectors[$sector] continue $jumps = get jumps from sector $a.sector to sector $sector do if $jumps > $a.maxrange continue $jumps = get jumps from sector [SECTOR] to sector $sector $table.sectors[$sector] = $jumps end @ = wait 500 ms
$sorted.array = sort table keys by value: table=$table.sectors $size = size of array $sorted.array $i = 0 while $i < $size $sector = $sorted.array[$i] inc $i = @ = wait 100 ms
$j = size of array $a.minerals while $j dec $j = $mineral = $a.minerals[$j]
if [THIS] -> get free amount of ware $mineral in cargo bay if $CAN.MINE.ROCKS $debris = find debris: sector=$sector resource=$mineral min yield=1 flags=null refobj=[THIS] num=1 max distance=null refpos=null if $debris -> exists $ret.Value = $sector endsub end else $debris = find debris: sector=$sector resource=$mineral min yield=1 flags=[Find.Debris] refobj=[THIS] num=1 max distance=null refpos=null if $debris -> exists $ret.Value = $sector endsub end end
if $CAN.MINE.ASTRO $debris = find asteroid: sector=$sector resourcetype=$mineral min.yield=1 flags=[Find.NonInvincible] refobj=[THIS] maxdist=null maxnum=null refpos=null if $debris -> exists $ret.Value = $sector endsub end end end end end endsub
sub.CheckBlacklist: $current.time = playing time $next.key = get next key: table=$blacklist.sectors key=null while $next.key $sector = $next.key $next.key = get next key: table=$blacklist.sectors key=$next.key $time = $blacklist.sectors[$sector] if $current.time > $time remove key $sector from table $blacklist.sectors end end endsub
* =============================================== sub.MoveToSector: if $dest.sector -> exists $text = sprintf: pageid=$Page.ID textid=2077, $dest.sector, null, null, null, null [THIS] ->set command extra display override: text=$text [THIS] ->set destination to $dest.sector @ $ret = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetosector : sector=$dest.sector if $ret == FLRET_NOPATH $time = playing time $time = $time + 3600 $blacklist.sectors[$dest.sector] = $time end [THIS] ->set destination to null end endsub
* =============================================== sub.FindDrill: $ret.Value = [FALSE] if [THIS] ->is laser installed: laser=Mobile Drilling System $ret.Value = [TRUE] endsub end if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Mobile Drilling System in cargo bay $turret = [THIS] -> get number of turrets while $turret dec $turret = if [THIS] -> fits laser Mobile Drilling System into turret $turret $ret.Value = [TRUE] endsub end end end endsub
* =============================================== sub.CanMineAsteroids: gosub sub.FindDrill do if $ret.Value endsub
$hornet.damage = get missile max damage of Hornet Missile $array = [THIS] -> get compatible missile array from cargobay $i = size of array $array while $i dec $i = $missile = $array[$i] $damage = get missile max damage of $missile if $damage >= $hornet.damage $ret.Value = [TRUE] endsub end end endsub
* =============================================== sub.CanMineRocks: gosub sub.FindDrill do if $ret.Value endsub
$turret = [THIS] -> get number of turrets while $turret dec $turret = $i = [THIS] -> get max. number of lasers in turret $turret while $i dec $i = $laser = [THIS] -> get laser type in turret $turret at slot $i if $laser $ret.Value = [TRUE] endsub end end
end endsub
* =============================================== sub.GetDropoffStorage: $ret.Value = [FALSE] if $a.dropoff $table.storage = table alloc $i = size of array $a.dropoff while $i dec $i = $station = $a.dropoff[$i] $j = size of array $a.minerals while $j dec $j = $mineral = $a.minerals[$j] $free = $station -> get free amount of ware $mineral in cargo bay do if $free $ret.Value = [TRUE] if $table.storage[$mineral] $amt = $table.storage[$mineral] $free = $free + $amt $table.storage[$mineral] = $free else $table.storage[$mineral] = $free end end end end endsub
* =============================================== * =============================================== return null

line.text: set command extra display override: text=
set command extra display override: text=

comment.var: not enough space, sell or drop off

line.text: set command extra display override: text=
set command extra display override: text=
sort table keys by value: table=
sort table keys by value: table=
set command extra display override: text=
get compatible missile array from cargobay
get max. number of lasers in turret

sval.val: not enough space, sell or drop off
